ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, the instigator of the quest is a rare spawn (though in a fixed location).  Be sure to report to us how it goes (with appropriate spoiler warnings).
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 15 Jul 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> YOU HAVE MADE MY DAY!!!!!! Finally a new weapon, i'm so excited to get
> home. Hope charismatic carillon plus the dark elf illusion of the mask of
> the deceiver gets me there, i've never been to neriak. Might try a mule.
> We'll see, thanks so much for this post John!

Well, the instigator of the quest is a rare spawn (though in a
fixed location). Be sure to report to us how it goes (with
appropriate spoiler warnings). I was actually trying to
learn if anyone had figured out the staff segment quest in
Highhold, and did a double take when I saw "lute" and "gypsy."
:-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
